comments:

I neglected to update the exportplugin.xml script.
Updated the AntCorePreferences and AntClasspathProvider to handle the case when 
the remote JAR is missing.

Also fixed the implementation of AntCorePreferences.getRemoteAntURL to be less 
lame :-)
